errors.error_description: The installation steps are in incorrect order - pip install is executed before creating and activating the virtual environment
correction_candidates:
conda create --name clarity python=3.8
conda activate clarity

pip install pyclarity

pip install pyclarity --user
conda create --name clarity python=3.8
conda activate clarity

conda create --name clarity python=3.8
pip install pyclarity
conda activate clarity

python -m venv clarity
source clarity/bin/activate
pip install pyclarity
errors.golden_answer:
conda create --name clarity python=3.8
conda activate clarity

pip install pyclarity
